title: S9, Ep6 How to Fail: Failosophy Special
description:
***SPECIAL EPISODE KLAXON***

To mark the publication of my new book, Failosophy, I take a trip down memory lane and share my favourite moments from the How To Fail archive, featuring Phoebe Waller-Bridge, Mo Gawdat, Alain de Botton and many, many more. AND I discuss the three personal failures that many lovely listeners sent in - they're funny and insightful and moving (best have a hankie nearby, is all I'm saying).

Thank you so much to everyone who took the time to write in and to all of you for listening. I love and appreciate you more than I can say.

*

Failosophy: A Handbook For When Things Go Wrong is published on 1st October and is available here

*

I am doing a LIVE show at the newly Covid-secure London Palladium on 2nd October at 6.30pm UK time. It is also live-streamed online. If you'd like to buy tickets for either option, you can do so here.

*

How To Fail With Elizabeth Day is hosted by Elizabeth Day, produced by Naomi Mantin and Chris Sharp. We love hearing from you! To contact us, email howtofailpod@gmail.com You can buy our fantastic PODCAST MERCH here.

* 

Social Media:

Elizabeth Day @elizabday

How To Fail @howtofailpod
